thread.title: Jumeirah Group celebrates success at Business Traveller Asia Pacific AwardsTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Jumeirah Group celebrates success at Business Traveller Asia Pacific AwardsTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Jumeirah Group celebrates success at Business Traveller Asia Pacific AwardsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Jumeirah Group celebrates success at Business Traveller Asia Pacific Awards Published on : Thursday, September 10, 2015
Jumeirah Group, the Dubai-based luxury hotel company and a member of Dubai Holding, has won ‘Best Business Hotel Brand in Middle East/Africa’ at the Business Traveller Asia Pacific Awards held in Hong Kong.
Robert Swade, Jumeirah Group Chief Operating Officer, said: “We are delighted to have been voted Best Business Hotel Brand in the Middle East/Africa for the third consecutive year. This confirms Jumeirah’s position as one of the region’s leading luxury business hotel brands and is a credit to both our hotel leadership and our colleagues around the world, who consistently deliver such exceptional service to our guests.”
The awards recognise and celebrate the achievements and high standards set by the region’s leading hotels, airports and airlines. The accolades are independent and based on votes received from the magazine’s readers. The awards cover 59 categories and all winners feature on the Business Traveller Asia Pacific website and will be published in the October edition of the magazine.
Jumeirah’s ambitious expansion plans to grow its portfolio of luxury hotels and resorts worldwide are well under way, with 25 new developments in the pipeline. Among these are eight new hotels planned in China; others are currently under development in India, Indonesia, Jordan, Malaysia, Mauritius, Oman, Russia and the United Arab Emirates.
Source:- Jumeirah
